rules_text: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent exiles one of them, then put the rest into your hand. That opponent may play the exiled card for as long as it remains exiled and may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast it.
flavor_text:
[i]“You could be free to roam millions of different worlds, or you could be stuck here. What would you prefer?”
—Kali to Jia Yi[/i]
